About me

I'm a student from Ukraine,Zaporizhzhia.

  • 2008 to 2019: School life
    I tried not to miss school, went every day, from time to time studied mathematics with my grandmother, studied well at school Time to time I learned English on the website Duolingo, a couple of minutes every day.
  • 2019: Start of studies in Poland
    After graduating from school, I went to study at the university WSB in Wroclaw. In the very first year of study, we began a superficial study of the Java language as well as the study of Word and Excel

About this site

This site is created from python Flask and is running by Mykyta.
